PostToolUse.command: echo '[proagent-platform] Template written. Verify: (1) placeholders use consistent syntax, (2) invariants are clearly separated from variables, (3) usage examples are included, (4) validation rules are defined.'
echo '[proagent-platform] Plugin manifest written. Verify: (1) name follows naming convention, (2) version uses semver, (3) all resource paths are valid, (4) description is clear and complete.'

echo '[proagent-platform] Skill file written. Verify: (1) YAML frontmatter has name and description, (2) description includes trigger terms, (3) body is under 500 lines, (4) references are one level deep from SKILL.md.'

PreToolUse.command: echo '[proagent-platform] Scaffolding output detected. Ensure generated files follow golden path conventions and include all required components (tests, docs, CI config).'

Notification.command: echo '[proagent-platform] DX feedback: Track time-to-first-contribution and self-service coverage for any new platform components.'
